title: INSIGHT: Italians attend 'Battle of the Oranges'
text:
INSIGHT: Italians attend 'Battle of the Oranges' 5:55pm GMT - 00:42 
Thousands of Italians turn out for a medieval citrus bash during carnival season's 'Battle of the Oranges'.The event, which dates back to medieval times, took place in the northern Italian city of Ivrea.   
Thousands of Italians turn out for a medieval citrus bash during carnival season's 'Battle of the Oranges'. The event, which dates back to medieval times, took place in the northern Italian city of Ivrea.  //reut.rs/2soj0Qi
